name: Skullcrusher SZ-bar
how_to_perform:
1. Start by lying on a flat surface with your back supported by the ground and your feet shoulder-width apart.
2. Hold an SZ-bar or a similar barbell over your shoulders with your hands shoulder-width apart, palms facing upwards.
*Markdown formatting not possible in this case*

3. Press the bar down into the ground below you by straightening your arms fully.
4. Keeping your elbows close to the back of your head and your upper arms still, slowly lower the weight down behind your head by bending at the elbow joint.
5. Stop briefly when the bar is about an inch above the ground.

6. Push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms fully once again.
7. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, keeping control and smoothness throughout the movement.
short_summary: Skullcrusher is a strength training exercise that targets the triceps, shoulders, and chest muscles when performed with an SZ-bar.
